thread.title: NFL: Aussie punter Jordan Berry impresses as Pittsburgh beat San Diego
thread.title_full: NFL: Aussie punter Jordan Berry impresses as Pittsburgh beat San Diego

author: Liam FitzGibbon
title: NFL: Aussie punter Jordan Berry impresses as Pittsburgh beat San Diego
text:
Video Image Jordan Berry's record punt streak 0:38 NFL: Aussie Steelers punter Jordan Berry has tied third for the all time record for most punts inside 20 minutes in a single game against the Chargers.
October 13th 2015 7 days ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/More Sports/ Jordan Berry produced the best performance of his NFL career yet.
Liam FitzGibbon FOX SPORTS JORDAN Berry has rounded out an encouraging week for Aussies in the NFL with one of the punting performances of the season so far in Pittsburgh’s last-gasp 24-20 win over San Diego.
Le’Veon Bell scored on a 1-yard wildcat run as time expired to secure the thrilling victory at Qualcomm Stadium on Tuesday but it was Berry’s consistency with the boot that had kept the visitors in the hunt.
The 24-year-old Australian kept the Chargers’ offense under constant pressure as he put six of his eight punts inside the 20 yard line — the most inside 20s by any NFL punter this week and the equal third-highest in a single match in NFL history.
Berry averaged 40.2 yards and had a long punt of 56 yards, with the performance earning him plenty of recognition on social media.
Hard Count: Hayne almost scores & game winners galore 4:46 NFL: The team from Hard Count break down all the action from week five, looking at Jarryd Hayne almost scoring, thrilling finishes, big hits, St. Louis end an Aaron Rodgers streak, and Laurie reports from the Giants v 49ers game.
October 13th 2015 7 days ago /video/video.news.com.au/Sport/More Sports/ That @JBerryEKU has quite the leg.
— #HereWeGo (@steelers) October 13, 2015 Making your pay tonight Jordan Berry!
— Dakhota Sweitzer ⚾ (@Sweitzer16) October 13, 2015 Jordan Berry's punts tonight have landed at the 16, 24, 11, 19, 7, 4 & 5. Putting on an absolute punting clinic. #ProkickAustralia
— Woot and Wye NFL (@WootandWye) October 13, 2015 It's an "inside the 20" masterclass from Jordan Berry tonight.
— Woot and Wye NFL (@WootandWye) October 13, 2015 Jordan Berry the punter is the best offensive weapon right now for the Steelers #PITvsSD
— Justin McCauley (@justinjmac) October 13, 2015 Jordan berry is the reason the steelers are in this game
— Steve Murcko (@murck_daddy61) October 13, 2015 Berry bounced back after a rough night out in last week’s loss to the Baltimore Ravens .
His display against San Diego followed strong performances from 49ers punt returner/running back Jarryd Hayne and New York Giants punter Brad Wing when the Aussies faced off on Monday .
Victorian Berry won the Steelers punting job by ousting incumbent Wing in an all-Aussie pre-season battle and his remarkable journey to the NFL included working night shifts at a Melbourne McDonalds last year to keep his dream alive.
The Steelers improved to 3-2 for the season.
Jordan Berry with Dad Jason at Steelers practice earlier this year. Source: Supplied
Originally published as Aussie’s NFL punting masterclass
